-- 영업관리 잔고/담보현황 거래처 / getCustomerBalanceGridList / @business_customerBalance.xml / 영업관리-잔고담보현황-조회(좌측jqGrid)
SELECT A.CUSTCODE AS CUST_ID, A.CUSTNAME AS CUST_NM FROM ORAGMP.CMCUSTM A, ORAGMP.CMCUSTSCRTD B WHERE A.CUSTCODE = B.CUSTCODE (+) AND A.CUSTCODE LIKE '%' ||#{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}|| '%' GROUP BY A.CUSTCODE, A.CUSTNAME HAVING NVL(SUM(B.SCRTAMT), -1) >= (#{gubun,jdbcType=VARCHAR} * -1) ORDER BY A.CUSTNAME ASC

-- 영업관리 잔고/담보현황 거래처 화면 상단 금액 / getCustomerSumBalance / @business_customerBalance.xml / getSumBalance 과 동일
SELECT A.*, (SELECT SUM(NVL(balance, 0)) FROM oragmp.SLRESULTM WHERE YEARMONTH = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM') AND CUSTCODE = #{customerId}) AS BEFORE_AMT --전월 잔고 , (SELECT NVL(SUM(scrtamt), 0) FROM oragmp.CMCUSTSCRTD WHERE CUSTCODE = #{customerId} AND NVL(returnyn, ' ') <> 'Y' AND expdate >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS SALE_DAMBO_AMT --담보가치액 합계 담보확보액 , (SELECT BALANCE FROM ORAGMP.SLRESULTM WHERE YEARMONTH = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') FROM dual) AND CUSTCODE = '1100947') AS CUR_AMT --현잔고 FROM ( SELECT NVL(SUM(totamt), 0) AS SALE_AMT, --당월매출액 금월판매 NVL(SUM(PENDBILLCOLJ), 0) AS JASU_AMT, --자수 NVL(SUM(PENDBILLCOLT), 0) AS TASU_AMT --타수 FROM ORAGMP.SLRESULTM A WHERE custcode = #{customerId} AND A.yearmonth = SUBSTR(SYSDATE, 0, 7) ) A

-- 거래처 잔고/담보 현황 목록 / getCustomerBalanceDetailCount / @business_customerBalance.xml SELECT COUNT(*) totalCnt FROM ORAGMP.CMCUSTSCRTD A, ORAGMP.CMCUSTM B WHERE A.CUSTCODE = B.CUSTCODE AND A.CUSTCODE = #{customerId}
